question: Who has won the 2018 women singles' Wimbledon tennis tournament?
explanation: Angelique Kerber has won the 2018 women singles\' Wimbledon tennis tournament by defeating 7-time winner Serena Williams by 6-3 6-3. With the win, Kerber has become the first German woman to win the title since Steffi Graf in 1996. Serena was bidding a record-equaling 24th major trophy.
